name: Amsterdam
description: Open and tolerant city, combining a strong culture with people of simple habits. This City preserves and offers its history and has a permanent offer of varied entertainment.

name: Barcelona
description: There's nowhere in the world like Barcelona. From days spent strolling the Gothic Quarter to afternoons at the beach and nights partying 'til dawn, the city is magnetic.

name: Berlin
description: The German capital has a great story to tell its visitors. Ravaged during World War II and divided by the Wall for 28 years, Berlin is regaining its former splendor by leaps and bounds.

name: Budapest
description: Dare to lose yourself in its streets full of history and you will discover why Budapest is known as The Pearl of the Danube and is visited by more than 7 million tourists each year. It will cast a spell on you.

name: Edinburgh
description: With its distinctly historic character, Edinburgh seamlessly blends old and new, offering visitors the perfect destination to experience the sights, sounds and tastes of a vibrant and diverse city.

name: Lisbon
description: A fascinating city full of history, monuments, impressive bridges and vintage street cars. Extremely interesting to visit and a place you will want to return to.

name: London
description: One of the most visited cities in the world due to its special and cosmopolitan character. Impossible to describe through a text, to know London it is necessary to visit it and live it.

name: Moscow
description: Thriving and exuberant capital that is brimming with life, culture and sometimes traffic. Home to numerous museums, Soviet-era monoliths, and post-Soviet kitsch.

name: Paris
description: A city that seems designed for the enjoyment of the traveler. Its streets, squares, buildings, gardens and monuments seem designed so that anyone who visits Paris wants to return.

name: Rome
description: The Eternal City because in it time seems to have stopped centuries ago. Its monuments and the remains of imposing buildings make a walk through its streets a journey back in time.

name: Vienna
description: A city with a special charm that will be the scene of many memories that you will not be able to forget. On your trip you can enjoy a Viennese coffee accompanied by a piece of the delicious Sacher cake.

name: Zurich
description: With countless events, a great food festival and the liveliest nightlife, throbs both day and night. Those looking for rest, meanwhile, can approach the Swiss mountains in less than an hour.
